name: titleId
description: a tconst, an alphanumeric unique identifier of the title

name: ordering
description: a number to uniquely identify rows for a given titleId

name: region
description: the region for this version of the title

name: types
description: Enumerated set of attributes for this alternative title. One or more of the following: "alternative", "dvd", "festival", "tv", "video", "working", "original", "imdbDisplay". New values may be added in the future without warning (array of string)

name: attributes
description: Additional terms to describe this alternative title, not enumerated (array of string)
